channel.title: PyCon on Mariatta
channel.description: Recent content in PyCon on Mariatta

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ Python Brasil 2022
item.description: Del Monte Gelateria I found Del Monte Gelateria inside Manaura shopping mall, which was walking distance from the hotel I was staying. I had trouble choosing a flavor because everything looks so good! Most people don’t speak english very well, but I was able to order what I want by pointing at the display ğŸ˜ View this post on Instagram A post shared by Mariatta Wijaya (@mariatta81)

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon Colombia 2022
item.description: Cows Ice Cream Whistler I gave a keynote speech at PyCon Colombia. It was an online event, so I didn’t actually get to have ice cream in Colombia. Perhaps one day. While on a camping trip to Whistler, I decided to get my Ice Cream Selfie at Cows Ice cream, which is a favorite place for us. Each time we’re there, there’s always a long lineup. ğŸ¦ğŸ˜ğŸ¤³ #IceCreamSelfie for @pyconcolombia #PyConColombia2022

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon APAC 2021
item.description: Bella Gelateria I gave a keynote speech at PyCon APAC 2021, which was hosted by PyCon Thailand. This was an online event, so I didn’t actually go to Thailand for this. However, I found an ice cream flavour that represent Thailand: Thai Coconut Milk Gelato from Bella Gelateria! Bella Gelateria has one of the best ice cream in Vancouver, they’ve won many awards! Belated #IceCreamSelfie for @pyconapac @pyconthailand ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡­ğŸ ğŸ¦ğŸ˜ğŸ¤³

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon US 2021
item.description: Vashti Rose In-House Made Ice Cream If you ever come to Port Moody, you must make a stop at Vashti Rose In-House Made Ice Cream. All of their ice creams are made from scratch locally, and they have vegan options too. ğŸ¦ğŸ˜ğŸ¤³ The time has come for #IceCreamSelfie #PyCon #PyConUS #PyConUS2021 Whiskey Hazelnut and Chocolate Brownie Ice Cream @ Vashti Rose Ice Cream pic.twitter.com/eUmMbIKECH — Mariatta ğŸ¤¦ (@mariatta) May 15, 2021

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon Belarus 2021
item.description: Matteo’s Gelato I went to Matteo’s Gelato in Port Coquitlam for this one, after first taking a stroll along Coquitlam River @ Lions Park. CrÃ¨me brÃ»lÃ©e and chocolate hazelnut gelato from Matteo's Gelato in Port Coquitlam. My reward for giving @pyconby closing keynote. ğŸ¦ğŸ˜ğŸ¤³ #IceCreamSelfie pic.twitter.com/i3zume2skU — Mariatta ğŸ¤¦ (@mariatta) March 14, 2021

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ SeaGL, PyCon Indonesia, PyCon Poland 2020
item.description: It was 2020. I joined so many virtual conferences, and at one point, I was a speaker at three different conferences all in one same weekend. 2020 was also, a challenging time, I didn’t get to go out a lot. I didn’t even get to do my Ice cream selfie after the conference. Finally, on new year’s eve, we decided to celebrate and go out. While in Robson Street, we stopped by a Korean grocery store and my kids saw some boba milk tea ice cream bar for sale.

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon Australia, and PyCon Taiwan 2020
item.description: Rocky Point Ice Cream 2020, the year of virtual conferences for me. I get to speak at two different conferences happening in the same weekend: PyCon Australia, and PyCon Taiwan. I decided to just get two scoops of ice cream from one shop. This is from Rocky Point Ice Cream. Thanks @pyconau and @PyConTW for having me! I gave talk at two conferences in the same weekend so I think I deserve the two scoops of ice cream from @RPIceCream (I picked matcha green tea and espresso flakes flavours)#IceCreamSelfie ğŸ¦ğŸ˜ğŸ¤³ pic.

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon US 2020
item.description: PyCon US 2020 was cancelled, but I still decided to record a tutorial for it. Since everything was still closed down at that time, so I just bought some ice cream and ice cream cones from the grocery store. Just doing #IceCreamSelfie in my own backyard ğŸ¦ğŸ˜ğŸ¤³ pic.twitter.com/CiwD4c4fl1 — Mariatta ğŸ¤¦ (@mariatta) April 24, 2020

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon DE 2019
item.description: Hokey Pokey Lucie recommended this place, and we met up and get to chat and catch up. Check out Eispatisserie Hokey Pokey in Berlin! A special #IceCreamSelfie with @Patjouk #PyConDE ğŸ¦ğŸ˜ğŸ¤³ pic.twitter.com/SFoQy6JI1x — Mariatta ğŸ¤¦ (@mariatta) October 13, 2019

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon US 2019
item.description: Cathy’s Gourmet Ice Cream Sandwiches PyCon US 2019 was a busy one for me. I gave a talk, a tutorial, and also ran the first Mentored Sprints with Nina Zakharenko and Tania Allard, AND co-chaired the Python Language Summit for the first time ğŸ˜µ (I ended up co-charing it for 4 years). I went to Cathy’s Gourmet Ice Cream Sandwiches. The ice cream sandwich was really yummy! ğŸ˜‹ I’m sad to hear that this place has since closed down.

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon US 2018
item.description: Mitchell’s Ice Cream At PyCon US 2018, I gave my talk What is a Python Core Developer. It was emotionally difficult to give that talk ğŸ¥² I went to Mitchell’s HomeMade Ice cream to celebrate. ğŸ¦ğŸ˜‹ğŸ¤³ pic.twitter.com/MG8XdAqulv — Mariatta ğŸ¤¦ (@mariatta) May 14, 2018
